backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Veil app implementing user registration, post creation/editing/deletion, reactions, invite codes, and admin/access-control logic using mixins and helper modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that frontend pages and hooks have been wired to the backend, listing the affected files and associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend structure and responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind layers and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Veil React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration with all app routes (login, signup, dashboard, post creation, my posts, community, admin) wrapped in a Layout with a Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component with tabbed navigation for managing public posts, members, invite codes, and post history.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Admin UI for viewing, adding, generating, revoking, and copying invite codes, split into active and used code lists.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Displays a sortable list of all public posts for admins, with the ability to delete individual posts via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Admin panel component for listing all users with options to suspend/unsuspend them and update their subscription status, with expandable user rows.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin tool that allows looking up and viewing all posts by a specific user via their Principal ID, with the ability to delete individual posts.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge for a given emotion type (confess, broke, happy) with configurable size.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, nav links (My Posts, Community, Admin), user pseudonym display, and sign-out button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that composes Header, main content area, and Footer into a full-page flex column.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component for displaying a user's post with support for inline editing, deletion, and toggling public/private visibility based on subscription status.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Renders a single public post card with emotion badge, author, date, content, and reaction buttons (support/care/strength), preventing reactions on own posts and handling error toasts.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: Displays an informational banner notifying the user their grace period has ended, showing region-based pricing and instructions to renew membership.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profile, registration, subscription status, posts, and reactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/utilities, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes (colors, emotion types, subscription states), and typography using Lora and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page that redirects unauthenticated users to login, shows a loading skeleton, and renders AdminDashboard or an access-restricted message based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: Community feed page that displays public posts sorted newest-first, redirecting unauthenticated or unregistered users, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page that greets authenticated users and lets them choose an emotion (Confess, Broke, Happy) to create a new post, with subscription status checks and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that handles Internet Identity authentication, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard or signup page based on whether they have a profile.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Page displaying the authenticated user's posts sorted newest-first, with loading skeletons and an empty state illustration.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Post creation form page for a specific emotion type, enforcing minimum word counts for Confess/Happy emotions and subscription status before allowing submission.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration page where new users enter an invite code, choose a pseudonym, and select a region to create their Veil account.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Utility functions for checking subscription permissions (post creation, make-public) and formatting subscription labels and regional pricing strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Utility functions for counting words in a string and checking against a minimum word threshold, with a constant for the 24-word minimum requirement.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Lora, Inter), oklch-based color tokens (primary, secondary, emotion states, sidebar, etc.), border radii, shadows, and spacing. Enables dark mode via class, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state for Veil (version 7), including architecture notes (React/Node/Express/MongoDB/JWT), known issues, and a list of already-implemented features with their requirement IDs and versions.
